dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I see a fragile creature wandering into my sacred forest. What business do you have here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I mean no harm, I am simply passing through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Trespassers are not welcome here, but if you promise to leave, I may not harm you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I promise to leave immediately. Please spare me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Leave now, and you won't face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave at once. Thank you for sparing me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Be gone from my sight, and trouble my forest no more.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave. You don't scare me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool! Since you won't heed my warning, prepare to face the consequences!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I cannot promise that. This forest intrigues me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity killed the cat, they say. Your fascination may lead you to your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I must explore further. I won't be scared off.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. You have sealed your fate by defying my warning.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand the risk. I will tread carefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wise choice. But one wrong step and you may find yourself in grave danger.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am on a quest seeking the ancient wisdom of the forest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ancient wisdom? Few are worthy of such knowledge. Who are you to seek it?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I humbly seek guidance to help my people in dire times.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dire times call for dire deeds. You may prove your worth, but be wary of the price.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept the risks. Please guide me to the wisdom I seek.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Follow the path and heed the warnings, lest you meet a fate you cannot escape.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I cannot afford any more risks. I will retreat for now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakness is a luxury you may not afford in these woods. Flee now, or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not disclose my intentions to a mere guardian.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, secrecy. It either shields a noble cause or a nefarious scheme. Which is it for you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My cause is noble, but I cannot reveal it to you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then your noble cause will either earn you respect or condemnation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It's best you don't know. I will be on my way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Your secrets may keep you safe or lead you to ruin. Choose wisely.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge the protector of this forest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a mere wanderer. Do you truly think you stand a chance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am prepared to face any challenge. Let us test our strengths.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. If you seek combat, then prepare for a battle you may come to regret.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am not backing down. Let's settle this here and now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish bravery. You will soon realize the price of challenging a guardian of the woods.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider. I will leave in peace without confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom prevails over foolishness. Leave this place and trouble it no more.
